alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 2:38AM EST until January 10 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany and Central and Eastern Allegany Counties. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Eastern Grant, Western Mineral and Eastern Mineral Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany
